name: @hrimthurs/tackle
description: Various auxiliary tools for working in JavaScript projects

scripts.build:dist: webpack --env build_prod part=Tackle && webpack --env build_prod part=TkArray,src/TkArray && webpack --env build_prod part=TkString,src/TkString && webpack --env build_prod part=TkObject,src/TkObject && webpack --env build_prod part=TkFunction,src/TkFunction && webpack --env build_prod part=TkService,src/TkService
